overview: Five lesbian couples in long-term relationships, all of them sympathetic, very conscious women, including Sunci and Fab, the founders of the popular lesbian online portal Shoe.org, ask themselves 10 basic questions about their relationships, e.g .: Was it love at first sight? What keeps you together and what could separate you? What are your strengths and what are your weaknesses as a couple? Do you still have sex?
title: Long Time Love
